Translations.Text: Pislya nykh, Vin zaminyv heneratsiyi kotri zahubyv Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta peresliduvav yikhniy lusts. Vony zaznayutʹ naslidkiv
Tilʹky tsey khto kayutʹsya, vvazhayutʹ, ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya vnese Ray, bez naymenshoyi nespravedlyvosti
park Eden ochikuyutʹ yikh, yak poobitsyane naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym dlya tsykh khto obozhnyuyutʹ Yoho, navitʹ u tayemnosti. Zvychayno, Yoho obitsyanka povynna prybuty proyty
Vony ne pochuyutʹ budʹ-yake bez·hluzdya tam; tilʹky myr. Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhni umovy tam, denʹ ta nich
Takyy Ray; my harantuyemo tse do tsykh sered nashykh sluzhbovtsiv shcho ye spravedlyvi
My ne prybuvayemo vnyz krim komandoyu vashoho Lorda. Yomu nalezhytʹ nashomu mynulomu, nashomu maybutnʹomu, ta vse mizh nymy. Vash Lord ye nikoly ne forgetful
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho ta steadfastly persevere u obozhnyuyuchomu Yo. Vy znayete budʹ khto khto dorivnyuye Yomu
lyudsʹke isnuvannya zapytuye, "Pislya ya vmyrayu, ya povertayusya do zhyttya
lyudsʹke isnuvannya zabuvayemo shcho my utvoryly yoho vzhe, ta vin nichoho
vashym Lordom, my zvychayno sklykayemo yikh, razom z chortamy, ta zberemo yikh navkolo Pekla, prynyzhenoho
Todi my zberemo z kozhnoyi hrupy naybilʹshyy revnyy oponent naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvyy
My znayemo povnyy dobre tsey khto naybilʹsh zasluhovuyemo horyachoho tam
Kozhnyy yedynyy odyn z vy povynni pobachyty tse; tse ye bezpovorotne rishennya vashoho Lorda
Todi my ryatuyemo spravedlyvyy, ta lyshayemo porushnykiv u tse, prynyzhenomu
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yim, yasno, tsey khto disbelieve skazhutʹ tsym khto vvazhayutʹ, 'Kotryy nas bilʹshe kvituchyy? Kotryy nas u bilʹshosti
Bahato heneratsiyi mayemo my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim; vony buly bilʹshe potuzhni, ta bilʹshe kvituchyy

Kazhutʹ, "Tsey khto vybyrayutʹ zablukatysya, naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy pryvede yikh na, do vony dyvlyatʹsya shcho musyatʹ obitsyayutʹsya dlya nykh abo retribution abo Hodyna. Tse - koly vony znakhodyatʹ khto diysno pidutʹ hirshyy, ta bilʹsh slabyy u potuzhnosti
BOH zbilʹshuye kerivnytstvo tsykh khto vybyrayutʹ keruvatysya. Dlya harnykh sprav vichno nahorodzhuyutʹsya vashym Lordom, ta prynosyatʹ daleko krashche prybutky
vy vidznachyly khto vidkhylyv nashi vidkryttya todi skazav, 'ya budu davatysya bahat·stvo ta ditey
vin pobachyv maybutnye? Vin vzyav taku zastavu z naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvu
Diysno, my zapyshemo shcho vin vymovlyaye, todi zdiysnyuyemo yoho kolysʹ- zbilʹshuyuchyy retribution
Todi my uspadkovuyemo vse vin ovolodiv, ta vin povertayetʹsya do nas vesʹ yedynyy
Vony obozhnyuyutʹ bilya BOHA inshi bohy shcho (vony dumayutʹ) mozhutʹ buty dopomohy yim
Navpaky, vony vidkhylyatʹ yikhniy idolatry, ta budutʹ yikh vorohy
vy ne dyvytesʹ yak my rozv'yazuyemo chortiv na disbelievers shchob zbudyty yikh
Ne budutʹ neterplyachyy; my pidhotovlyayemo dlya nykh deyake pidhotuvannya
denʹ prybude koly my sklykayemo spravedlyvyy pered naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym u hrupi
Ta my budemo stado vynuvatyy do Didʹka, shchob buty yikhni vichnyy abode
Niyakyy kozhnyy ne ovolodiye potuzhnistyu intercede, krim tsykh khto prystosovuyutʹsya do zakoniv naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvykh
Vony skazaly, "Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy begotten syn
Vy vymovyly velykyy blasphemy
nebo zbyrayutʹsya shatter, zemlya zbyrayetʹsya slʹoza asunder, ta hory zbyrayutʹsya kryshatʹsya
Tomu, shcho vony zayavlyayutʹ shcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy begotten syn
Tse ne befitting naybilʹshyy Dobrozychlyvyy shcho Vin musytʹ beget syn
Kozhnyy yedynyy u nebi ta zemli ye sluzhbovetsʹ naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvyy
Vin okhopyv yikh, ta rozrakhuvav yikh
Usi prybudutʹ pered tym, yak Yo na Dni Resurrection tomu shcho osoby
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyve bude yim zlyvy z kokhannyam
My takym chynom zrobyly tse (Quran) vysvitlyuvaly u vashomu yazykovi, aby dostavyty harnu novynu do spravedlyvu, ta shchob poperedyty z tse oponenty
Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly; vy mozhete vidchuty budʹ- yakykh yim, abo mozhete pochuty z nykh budʹ-yakyy zvuk? . H. (Ta Ha)
